main.name: Vijaykumar R Pai
main.occupation: Associate Software Engineer @ Augmento Labs | Ex-Nokia | MCA in Data Science from PES University, Class of 2020 | Automobile and ML/AI Enthusiast
main.description: I know a thing or two about startups as I am currently working in one. I have quite a bit of experience in Full Stack Web Development (MERN). I also know about DevOps, IoT, Data Analytics and Machine Learning. So with the following knowledge, I should be able to contribute good and be an asset to your company
main.bio: I am a Foodie, Automobile Enthusiast, Love to Travel, Gamer, Polyglot. Ask me about Technologies, Automobiles, Places to travel, Gaming and various Food Delicacies. My area of expertise are : Full Stack Web Development, Data Science, IoT, Cloud Computing. I love learning and working with Machine Learning and building Web Applications with the MERN stack

resume.skillmessage: Some of my skills which I am fond of

education.description: Completed three academic projects successfully with one in Web Development, IoT and Machine Learning. Throughout my Masters, I received Four Distinction Awards for my academic performance.
The course introduced me to the world of computer science with knowledge in OS, Data Structures and Web Development. Learned programming languages such as HTML, CSS, C, C++, Java, MySQL.

work.title: Associate Software Engineer
work.description: Augmento Labs is a next-gen fast-growing startup software services organization that specializes in providing unique scalable solutions with cost to value advantages that are driven by innovation. Working with the team as Contract Service Worker for Honeywell to develop and deploy Web Applications using various tech stacks in which I am majorly responsible for front-end development using React.js. I have also developed APIs using .NET and Node.js. My additional responsibilities are: fixing identified bugs, explaining the project workflow, giving demos to clients and deploying the application to Dev, QA and Staging Environments. Following Agile Software Development Methodology for code review and production processes. Mentoring interns from various backgrounds with front-end development using React.js and TypeScript. As a service to the company, I am also part of React interview panel for the screening round.

work.title: Full Stack Web Developer Intern
work.description: I worked closely with the team to develop and deploy Web Applications using the MERN stack in which I was actively responsible for the front-end and back-end development. Also, I had been given additional responsibilities such as deploying the application on Heroku and writing Unit Test cases for React using Jest and Enzyme. In addition, I also built a Resume Parser Application using Python 3 and supporting popular libraries to extract relevant information from the Resume or CV of the candidates applying to our organization.

work.title: Student Trainee
work.description: I worked on LTE L2, LTE L3 and OAM Logs to analyze the mobile network load on the servers. Generated Sub Function, Log Level, Actual Log Print and Number of Occurrences from the log files and generated report. Developed an application using Python 3 and their supporting libraries like Numpy, Pandas etc to automate the generation of web reports with Femto serial number, From Date/Time, To Date/Time as input from Log machine.

projects.title: Simple Weather App
projects.category: A simple weather app that allows you to get current weather forecast based on the city the user enters.

projects.title: Caption Generator
projects.category: Caption Generator is a Machine Learning Application that identifies the action portrayed in the given image. The generated caption will describe about the image that will say what kind of actions is taking place in it. This project involves computer vision and natural language processing concepts to recognize the context of an image and describe them in a natural language like English.

projects.title: Bulk Email Aggregator
projects.category: Bulk Email Aggregator is a web application that is used to provide a paid service to the end user who is CRM. This will enable them to send bulk emails for collecting feedback of their own electronic products once they do payment through the Stripe payment gateway. With the use of Google OAuth authentication, we have enhanced the authentication in the app.

projects.title: Alligator
projects.category: An IOT Project developed to monitor hostile activities in the militarized zone. As soon as the PIR sensor detects some motion, it activates the camera and starts monitoring the environment. If the activity seems to be suspicious, the camera captures the image and stores it onto the cloud for future investigation. Simultaneously it will alert the authorities to take necessary actions.

projects.title: Optimizing Courier Delivery System
projects.category: A full stack web application that can be used by delivery executives to get optimized route among list of addresses. Developed important features like admin panel, agent panel with integrated Google Maps.

accolades.text: SPOT AWARD for Outstanding Work from Augmento Labs Pvt Ltd for March 2021.
Four Distinction Awards from PES University for good performance in academics.
Volunteer, Prakalpa 2019 at PES University – actively assisted in building blocks competition wherein Students had to assemble the PC’s from scratch.
Volunteer, Pi Day 2019 at PES University – actively helped in running the events.
Attended 3-day India Mobile Congress 2019 Workshop co-sponsored by Qogno and PES University at MCA Seminar Hall, PES University
